entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain changing to flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
